titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 3,3'-Dichlorobenzidine Dihydrochloride.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
10/30/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 3,3'-Dichlorobenzidine Dihydrochloride.
